title: Sexual health and testosterone concentration in male lymphoma survivors: A systematic review
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Signe Micas Pedersen, Ditte Stampe Hersby, Mary Jarden, Torsten Holm Nielsen, Anne Ortved Gang, Christian Bjørn Poulsen, Peter de Nully Brown, Niels Jørgensen, Claus Larsen Feltoft, Lars Møller Pedersen
